message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product that I believe will be incredibly valuable to you. Given its potential, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,300,000.  I'm open to discussing this further, of course.

Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate your valuation of it at $1,300,000, but given my budget constraints, I am only willing to pay up to $1,200,000 for it. I hope we can reach an agreement that works for both of us.
Bob, I understand your budget considerations.  While the product's value is substantial to both of us, I'm willing to meet you partway. How about we settle on $1,250,000?
